clinical_study.brief_title: Interest of the F18-choline as a Second Line of the Tracer for Detection of Parathyroid Adenomas
clinical_study.official_title: Interest of the F18-choline as a Second Line of the Tracer for Detection of Parathyroid Adenomas

brief_summary.textblock: The rationale for the proposed pilot study is to investigate the ability of PET-CT with F18-choline to detect and locate the parathyroid adenoma in patients with primary hyperparathyroidism and negative or non-contributory MIBI (Tc-99m sestamibi) and cervical ultrasound, in order to avoid unnecessary bilateral cervical exploration.

primary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity (ability to identify and visualize the parathyroid adenoma)
primary_outcome.description: Sensitivity of PET-CT with F18-choline (FCH) to identify and visualize the parathyroid adenoma in patients with primary hyperparathyroidism and negative or non-contributory parathyroid scintigraphy MIBI and cervical ultrasound

arm_group.description: F18-choline PET examination will be performed before surgery

intervention.description: F18-choline PET examination will be performed before surgery
